Text: Re World travelerWow It sounds as if you really have been busy I expect postcards from each of the exotic places that you visit I think that we probably have a greater chance of meeting in an airport than in either Atlanta or Houston Congrats on your appointment and honour at the Museum of Fine Arts It sounds really exciting You will really get to hob nob with the artistic typesI am a little envious I am actually awaiting several people in my group to arrive as we have a group project to do this weekend remember thaose days of group projectsit is a little different when you are people have to feed their kids and take care of those domestic obligations Ill send you Doris info in the next emailI have it at home Take care and definitely let me know if you will visit South Africa Try to go during our winter as it will be summer there andi

Re UpdateJeff I was going through my emails when I came across one from you to which I never responded A few days after you asked if I was working with anthrax I was whisked to DCv on a charter flight to assist with the investigation there It was an amazing and intense experience during which I learned a tremendous amount It was very different being a part of a team as opposed to directing an investigation I unfortunately did not have much time to explore DC although we were staying in a very nice part of Dupont Circle I am happy to be back in Atlanta where I have been for only weeks since July I still have quite a bit of work to complete related to the investigation before letting the rest of the team make their advice suggestions and contributions How have you been I read briefly that Enron was having some tough times Did this affect you directly or were the happenings in another division Are you going back to Louisville for Thanksgiving or will you be traveling I will be here in Atlanta working and hopefully taking a couple of hours off to enjoy a little turkey nwith friends The PennAtlanta alumni club will be holding an holiday party in weeks which I hope to attend if I am in town I know other other PennAtlanta couples so perhaps it will be a good way to reconnect with some people Does Houston have any similar events I hope that things are going well for you I will be an aunt by the time that I will next speak to you Best andi

ReThings are crazy busy hopefully I ll have more time to chat soon Thanks for thinking of me andi Reply Separator Originally From Shankman Jeffrey A JeffreyA NRONcom Subject Date pm Hi there are you working wiith this anthrax thing Jeff This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Surrealism and an old contactDear Jeff I have been in Atlanta for two weeks and am continuing to unpack and assemble furniture I thought of you last night as I came across the wonderful surrealism book that you gave me what a great book Of course I had to stop my unpacking to read through parts of it I did not get much unapcking done but I had fun I reconnected with Christina Johns one of my roomates at Penn with Dori and she passed along Doris email address I sent her an email and she responded and appears to be happy in Philly with her month old daughter I told her that we had seen each other in NYC during the past years and gave her an update on your successes and accomplishments I hope that work is going well I have to return to an orientation session My new phone number and address Houston Mill Rd NE Apt Atlanta GA Does Enron have an office in Atlanta Best andi
